**Candidates may swiftly access their details by typing their surname or registration number into the search box located below.** 




```{r echo=FALSE}
library(readxl)
cw21062023<- read_excel("cw21062023.xlsx")
library(DT)
datatable(cw21062023,class = 'cell-border stripe', rownames = FALSE,  options = list(pageLength = 100, scrollX=T,columnDefs=list(list(targets=2,visible=TRUE),list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 1:9))) )%>%
  formatStyle(
    'Test_1',
    color = styleInterval(c(0.495, 0.75), c('red', 'black', 'green')), fontWeight = 'bold') %>%
  formatPercentage('Test_1', 0)%>%
formatStyle(
    'Test_2',
    color = styleInterval(c(0.495, 0.75), c('red', 'black', 'green')), fontWeight = 'bold') %>%
  formatPercentage('Test_2', 0)%>%
  formatStyle(
    'Test_3',
    color = styleInterval(c(0.495, 0.75), c('red', 'black', 'green')), fontWeight = 'bold') %>%
  formatPercentage('Test_3', 0)%>%
 formatStyle(
    'Quiz_1',
    color = styleInterval(c(0.495, 0.745), c('red', 'black', 'green')), fontWeight = 'bold') %>%
  formatPercentage('Quiz_1', 0)%>%
 
  formatStyle(
    'Quiz_2',
    color = styleInterval(c(0.495, 0.745), c('red', 'black', 'green')), fontWeight = 'bold') %>%
  formatPercentage('Quiz_2', 0)%>%

    'AS_1',
```
